column3: “In my top 3 of all time! That cherry flavor is weet and familiar and one of a kind all at once. Red hairs, dense, frosted, but that smell! So sweet. Tasted even better just amplified from the smell. Caped in the volcano. Little goes a long way. Felt relaxed, not lazy. Felt happy, good, general sense of well being. Troubles melted away. I felt very sexual and making love was amazing. Touch was so sensitive. No let dow...”

“This is a strong flower. And that is coming from an every evening smoker. Not many buds could knock me down with just one bowl, but boy howdy did this girl do her trick. And even fewer bud could do so, and have the ability to relate that it was a pleasant experience for me? Even fewer. She is aptly strong, but doesn't want to hurt you- just play with you.”

“Comes on fast. Feels good entire time. Tastes and smells absolutely delicious! Gets rid of headaches, nausea, and a lot of stress. Total relaxer. Uplifts your mood a lot, from also not stressing anymore. Easier to laugh. Calm, chill, functioning high.”
“ping pong ball sized nugs flocked like an xmas tree with opaque and amber trichomes. set up my magic flight launch box vaping rig, turned on tool's 10
column4: 000 days" and got down. i think the vape's temp may have been a bit high
column5: on the verge of combustion. the tste was a little berry-sweet
column7: earthy back end. my body was immobilized
column9: and at one with the papa-son
column10: while my brain was imagining al...”"

column3: “Literally the best high I've ever experienced. Definitely not a couch lock, very active strain that gave us 6 ridiculous laughing fits. Crazy munchies, a lot of weird but funny speculations and philosophies were said. Great strain to listen to music to.”

“A real gem right here, cherry Kush is a beautiful member of the kush family. The batch I got was A+. Dense, aromatic, and a quick relief from the body high. Taste much like master kush but hints of the purple afghani come through.”
“Awesome hybrid. Great taste. Solid head and body high. Works great for relaxation.”

“Was recommended this strain from the budtender for my anxiety, picked up a quarter. Smoked a bowl right after lunch when I happened to feel an anxiety attack coming on. Taste was a bit like burnt Cherry Pop Tarts. Instantly gave me a racy feeling, I felt like I drank too much coffee and the head high was a little too introspective for work. I kept thinking out loud. Overall was a decent high, very warm and uplifting ...”

“I'll give Cherry Kush 5 stars simply because it tastes great, and I know if I need a good night sleep this girl will put me out like a light. The Cherry Kush I obtained has a deep, dark, indica effect. Not something I would do in the day, unless it was nap time. Very cherry flavor mix with a classic Kush flavor. Try it using glass to get the full flavor.”

“Vision immediately brightens and widens. Combined with a slow, but honed focus, you assess things as individual scenes - settling into a single perspective with no periphery. I smoked a lot at once and the effects came on quickly and enjoyably, with the exception of an uncomfortable twinge in the chest saying I did too much at once. I’m sure it’ll settle, especially as the body high kicks up, but mind the warning. Mu...”
“One of my favorites. Cherry Kush has a very berry flavor to it as its name would suggest. Its smell is sweet and strong. Beautiful red hairs.”
“I'm One to believe there can be only One". And a good concentrate just needs one chance to step up to "the plate". One sniff
column4: One look. One dab on a homemade Kanthal micro vaporizer coil with a stainless steel mesh wick.  And if it's as good as this Chery Kush Oil you lean back
column5: and you know you've found yourself One nice corner of the Cannabis phenotype map.

column1: Though I'm a big fan of the so-called "Sativa" branch

column3: “Brainy high. We thought about how a base 12 system makes a lot more sense. In terms of the taste, it tastes like cherry coke, but probably because we've been drinking cherry coke, as well as a little nutty and earthy. But I took a dab before I came here so what do I know. As for the the sensation, I feel real weird right now." Was a good description. Would smoke again. "We should start a band!"”"

“My favorite strain. I can never find it. Found some today and its so fire. I'm from Oregon and the tree here I feel is some of the best on earth. Cherry kush and cherry pie are two different strains though. Cherry pie is grand daddy purple and Durban poison. Cherry kush is purple Afghan and O.G kush. I really hate when people call it the same thing. Like every website is wrong. Cherry kush is normally a green color w...”
“I love this strain.  I'm so stoned right now.”

“The quintessential indica: strong, fruity nose; red hairs and dense trichomes; and a rich smoke that doesn't cause a cough. Effects began within 1-2 minutes with an immediate chill" feeling with a veneer of euphoria. Senses of touch and taste were significantly elevated.
or sex. Pairs well with crisp and more mineral whites like a verdicchio or a chenin blanc from California.”"
“Cherry Kush is a very long lasting and potent strain of weed.”

“My cherry kush came covered in trichomes, orange hairs, and purple/green, this was one of my favorite strain to smoke. The smell will fill the room, so make sure it is sealed properly. I have never smoked any strain with such an intense sweet, cool, and somewhat minty taste. Smoked from a joint it hits hard and may make you cough, but if you smoke it out of a bowl you should be fine. The high feels like an intense ru...”

“I picked some up as a special. There was absolutely no smell to the buds - zero. I was worried that the vendor ripped me off, but the smoke - though it didn't have a ridiculous peak - was mellow and long-lasting.”
“I originally purchased this as All Star" which isn't an actual strain
column4: but a brand of Cherry Kush. And come to find out there are people who call this strain "Cherry Pie" out in California
column5: but in Phoenix Cherry Pie is the strain listed on Leafly (Durban x GDP). So name problems abound....

column1: Still it bears some resemblance to Cherry Pie—big
column3: and about as purple. This particular bud has a dense tri...”"

“This was one of the first Cherry strains that I had and it was amazing! It's a very euphoric and uplifting high that will not leave you stuck to the couch! It makes everything you do 100 times better and if you're with friends, you'll laugh more than ever. The after effects just slowly settle you down back to your normal self which is a good thing meaning you wont have to smoke more just to wake yourself up from a hi...”

“Great high! Very long lasting for only smoking a small amount. I smoke primarily to reduce anxiety and help sleep but this actually reduced my anxiety and kept me up! Had a great time playing monopoly and listening to music. Absolutely would recommend”

“This is a mid-grade Indica dom hybrid. Not too strong. It's a good smoke if you want to relax a little, but not go overboard with the couch lock feeling.

It has a great cherry like smell.”
“Good strain for Insomnia and headaches.  Really heavy couch lock on this strain,  Buds we're hard and sticky, very nice. Definitely recommend but not for the novice smoker.”

Felt real light on my feet during the game like I was floating and was joking and laughing a lot while we played and then we got really hungry after and came home and cooked ...”

My new favorite.”

“I am ADHD and strains tend to not react as expected.  Cherry Kush has become my go-to for both pain relief and for combating the insomnia with which I am plagued.  For me, it is particularly enhanced when using high CBD strains such as Harlequin, Cannatonic, or Harle-Tsu along with the Cherry Kush.  The high is quite mellow and pleasant.  Full body relaxing but no couch-lock.”

column3: “This one is very good, but I would not suggest for day use if you plan on going out and about. It defiently takes your body aches and pains away, and clears your mind. Its so relaxing. I wouldnt plan on driving any time soon after this one. 💚”
“all i got to say is dank one of my favorite from da famous Kush fam shitz dank yo!”

“If you aren't a berry person, know that taste does not come through much at all IMO. It isn't often that I feel more than simply relief from anxiety, nausea, pain, and insomnia. However, this one snuck up on me with a strong feeling of euphoria, relaxation, and body high. Definitely a keeper.”
“Nice calm feeling, but it mostly just made me hungry. Minimal euphoria.”

“Was smoking reggie for a while, this really opened my eyes (and then promptly reddened and closed them) to how much better a quality strain is. Highly recommend, although I tried a strain called ISIS and it puts this to shame. Still a good strain by itself though!”

If you have access to this strain, you cant go wrong with it. Definitely a must in my books.”

column3: “love the cherry flavor! in my top 5 favs...nice mellow  high, smooth & sweet! cant wait for someone in phoenix to carry this again!!!!!!”

“found my high to turn out more on the energetic/sativa like side,,, helped a ton with lack of appetite/ability to eat. As well as being very awake, you are actually pretty mellow ...idk.. Still vibing w it. Xxxxx stoney babes”
“fantastic weed. it's easy for me to get too high on most other strains but this one makes me high as balls and still chilled as fuck. one of the best highs I've ever had.”
“Love it”
“Cherry 🍒 Kush. Easy to look at but oh so hard to master. This is what the word complex" is all about. Flavors reaching from Cherries
column5: but also a natural smokiness remiminicemt of a Sativa such as Durban's Poison.”"

column3: “this shits fire”
“3.5/5⭐️-this strain has such a strong cherry smell to it and a bit of a cherry and hashy taste to it. Wouldn't buy it a lot but definitely worth trying out!👍🏽”

“Very strong sweet piney smell. Green buds with orange hairs and hints of purple.  Sticky when breaking apart.,  I got this gram from Terra Canna farms and just like everything they produce, this bud looks like a piece of art.  THC percent was 15.17% so it made for a good mellow high.  I smoked a bowl right when I got up this morning and I feel rather clear headed and motivation driven, as evidenced by the length of t...”
“Had the shatter version made by Treetop Labs in Michigan. Sweet flavor with a heavy sedation. Definitely a heavy high, but very blissful and chill.”
“It has the standard kush smell and taste. Had the heaviest body high I have had in a long time.  Put me right to sleep.”
“At a [6] right now, I really like this stuff. Makes me feel really happy with how everything is going.”
“Cool dro got it in a cone def going back for more and the staff at hercules are the best”
“really beautiful flower nice red color to the bud and a wonderful smell and taste”
“So so good! When to OG, in eugene, and got some of this from Alex, good look in out this stuff is so good relaxing and will give you a nice clean head change.”

“good happy mellow high. 👃 smell is
 strong. and its smoth”
“this Kush is officially the bomb new favorite strain Cherry KUSH JAH”
“Smells and tastes like cherry and kush..FTD...”
“Five stars, made my eyes numb..  Definitely puts you on another level”
“Not my favorite, but it did help relax me and help with anxiety. No help with the insomnia though. I didn't find harsh like other reviews have.”
“A decent strain, but if given other options I probably won't pick it up again. The taste is crazy good, but I found that I felt headachy and anxious more times than not.”
“Beautiful taste in my experience, easy to smoke with an amazing smell, leaving me full of energy yet so calm at the same time”

“Like the cherry on top of a ice cream Sunday, this cherry kush is a great way to top the day off and let your stresses and worries melt away into a cerebral stone leaving you happy and care free. Amazing stone.”
“dank”

“Was in severe back pain and sciatic pain. After two hits, I feel relaxed and my pain is tolerable once more. The nuggs are nice and sugary, and pretty freaking hard to grind up, which should tell you how thick the nuggs are. I recommend this strain for back pain sufferers.”
“love it nice stress reliever great for sleep smoke all day every day JAH”
“I ama sativa smoker and this cheyy kush is a nice even mox feeling of indica and sativa. great tast. outdoor organic os the better option and purity mon.”

“Good strain.  Combines a good head high with a nice body high.  I normally prefer something even more indica dominate, but the euphoric head high with the body sensations are a very nice touch of this strain.”
“Wonderful, sweet smell. The high was relaxing and mellow. All in all, it was some good bud.”
“This gave me a mellow feel...relaxed and happy.  Not a stoney baloney kind of strain if that's what you are looking for.”
“Not a fruity bud fan but this cherry kush has a lil something to it nice trichomes and sweet aroma”

“Cherry Kush love this shiptz not as good as Gram's cherry pie or breaded pork chopz w apple sauce but hit that sweet spot in your heart smoking this strain.Pie I picked was very on point wreaked of sterile clean cherries. Buds were tightly dense and compact buds. glittered out.Smoked very well w/ hemp wick nice tasty cherries and purp.Always will be a PIE guy CAKE is a LIE! 1:1 5mg bid sublingual daily dose sitting l...”
“an intensely amazing head and body high, couldn’t ask for anything better to smoke on my day off, relaxed af 💨”
“Great tasting flower when consumed in a pipe...you can taste the berry after taste. Good body high great for lounging”
“not the best high, but the taste and smell... absolutely fantastic. Tastes like Cherry candy!”
“cherry kush was an amazing  strain  for me. it tasted great  and medicated  me for a long time. it was nice and relaxing and also relieved my anxiety.”
“It is alright”
“good weed”

“Recently tried a zip of this from one of the better local dispensaries. Dense heavy bud structure with a heavy frosting throughout. Very resinous and perfectly cured for my personal taste. Outstanding smell and flavor. The smoke when deeply inhaled has a tart cherry flavor upfront on the tongue with a slight sweet finish. I found it to be a nice relaxing head high and after a slight delay it settles into the body. I ...”
“pretty decent strain. high was intense but short. was a pleasure to keep burning tho. buds were light and fluffy that ground up very nice.”

“This is my first grow in years. This Cherry Kush strain has been so far very easy. Great strain for a beginner.  I'm in the fifth week of flower and the buds are filling out really nice and becoming very dense.  I'm really looking forward to seeing my final product and what kind of yield I'm going to to pull off with 16 plants under 1 600w hid bulb.”
“I enjoyed this strain, for anybody who has insomnia it works great to help sleep. It has a nice taste and smells amazing. #420sweepatakes”

“The medroom has the for 200.00 a OZ      thats a deal!!
KILLER NUGZZZZ”
“Some solid flower. great woodsy smell. kinda like a stuck a cherry pit up my nose. very effective but not sedating. I'd recommend it.”
“One of my other all time favorites if it's the right strain no a fake”

“So personally I'm a fan of fruit comeback. The cherry notes to add to a very flavorful vape. I will test this with a few different food items I believe that will pair together nicely. Nice uplifting feeling at first, like those first few sips of your morning cup of coffee. A nice cerebral effect then takes places 10 minutes in. I am now more focused and thinking deeper on how to do the best I can in life. I'm using a...”
“Great strain that STINKS of sweet citrusy kush. Not a super couch lock high but very balanced. Grab some if you come across it. A new favorite for sure.”
“Very smooth, tasty. Relaxing/motivating high. Love this strain.”
“The night before was hell, and the day was long and hard on my legs. I loaded a third of a gram of cherry kush and after that life was bliss, iv been happy ever since.”
“I got some concentrate of this. I was up for 3 days lol”
“Great taste o.k.stone”
“my wallet got stolen and my grinder to but after dabbing cherry kush. I couldn't really stay mad. great to lift your mood.”
“Good head high... I smoked too much and got a headache and that was no fun though”
“Edible form was very mild; taken in Ganja Goo" form.”"

“well they say this is referred to as Cherry Pie sometimes.i have had Cherry Pie (excellent) and it didnt look or taste like this one i have now.this one is also very good smoke,sweet,spicy,chunky nugs,red,green and gold in color.it took me a while to get through a joint of this,at least an hour and i consider that pretty good f/ me.pretty much took care of all my shit as most hazes do.will always buy!from ACES,claimi...”
“Works on so many levels.”
“Smoked some tonight. Nice high. Smells great, relaxed me right away. Got the munchies, then passed out for about an hour. Definitely had some indica characteristics.”
“Great Flavor, & A Nice Sweetish Scent :) 8.5/10”
“Vaped this. Hits you almost immediately, pure chill, happy, relaxed but not lazy, trailed off with the munchies, slept like a baby and woke up refreshed.”
“Always a nice evening with this strain... Very good for before bed, because it really makes you quite relaxed. Definitely get tingly" after a hit or two
column4: kinda like being aroused all over
column5: if that makes sense. All in all one of my favorite indicas.”"

column3: “LOVE THIS STRAIN!  Cherry Kush will Always be 5 Stars In My Strain Favs ☆☆☆☆☆”
“This strain was so relaxing in to smoke and to make into an edible. This is DEFINITELY one of my favorites. 25 out of 5 bitches!!!”
“dense, light colored nugs that have a sweet, but subtle terpine profile. the cherry comes through right off the bat, followed by a harsh, but pleasent earthy flavor.”
“bomb”
“Really good weed had me fucked up for hourz. 1 massive bong hit you're set don't be scared to hit it the coughing only last a little.”
“This strain was excellent. I would definitely continue to use it. Very strong. It's a body high though, and I wouldn't recommend ingesting too much if you don't want a  couch lock.”
“Well rounded buzz, cherry scent, tasted of throat spray nice dense buds.”

“This high is fangoblintastic guys.  You have no idea how ripped i got off dis shizz.  I am so happy!  It is a must toke kiddos n ganstaz.  funtastic flava and awesome other qualities that you must find out on jour own!”

“I would say this is a 4/5. Just like other Kush varieties, Cherry Kush is extremely smooth in both inhale and exhale. Sweet with a tinge of citrus and berry. Effects are certainly felt from the Kush side of things, but I can also feel the upliftedness coming from the sativa that's also rooted in this strain. Great mixture of highs, and overall an awesome hybrid”
“very pretty and fast acting!!! i love it, smelly too!!”
“I love this strain makes me feel uplifted and creative very good for work LOL one joint would do the trick”

“This was recommended as they cant keep the good stuff on the shelf. DONT waste your time with this strain. it is not tasty or stony. As I was told by the owner the THC % rating are completely inaccurate, they are in many cases. for $20.00 more on the half you can get something tasty. This is crappy.”
“If you are in the mood to eat, Cherry Kush is your go-to strain. The flavor tastes like weed should and makes you hungry as hell.”

“A friend of mine came by and she had two different types of cannabis (aka) marijuana, she let me try about, the first one was Cherry Kush, very mild, nice mellow high, had a good pick me up to it. The next one was Lime something I really can't remember the last part of the name, but the both of them really work extremely well together, my depression & anxiety were so very low, I felt like I did when I was younger, th...”
